title: Cargill to close meat-packing plant at centre of Alberta outbreak - The Globe and Mail
description:
1. Cargill to close meat-packing plant at centre of Alberta outbreak  The Globe and Mail
  2. Local Doctor Says AHS And Town Doctors Are Here For You  HighRiverOnline.com
  3. Cargill To Idle High River Facility  SwiftCurrentOnline.com
content:
Cargill said the High River plant, seen here on April 20, 2020, will process about three million meals with products currently in the facility in order to prevent food waste. 
Todd Korol/The Globe and Mail
One of Canadas largest slaughterhouses is halting o… [+7175 chars]
